issue.title: [C++] Arithmetic kernels for numeric arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12748](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12748). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a parent Jira for the buildout of element-wise ("scalar") mathematical or arithmetic functions that operate on numeric arrays and scalars.
